page.title: 02WHERE I LIVE
page.content: I live at Bolton Road, Aspull. I like living in Aspull,because I have lots of friends,and there is lots to do .Across the road from my house there is a common.In the summer we play rounders and other games.I go to Aspull church school it is only across the road.From where I live it only takes afew minutes to get there.There are some shops up the road.There is a betting shop, a chemist, a paper shop, a laundrette and a clothes shop.On monday night after school I go to the high school to play netball.Then at 6.15 I go to a club called monday nighters, we play games and go for walks.On tuesdays I go to St Davids brownies it starts at 6.00 and ends at 7.30. I like going and Iam the oldest there now.On fridays I go to dancing classes there are four classes
